title: R packages
text:
Here is a list of R packages I have authored or contributed to:



Package name
Package status
Description




funrar

Compute functional rarity indices (see more at https://rekyt.github.io/funrar/)


ecolottery

An R package to simulate community assembly using coalescent theory


GIFT

An R package to access the Global Inventory of Floras and Traits (GIFT) database (see more at https://biogeomacro.github.io/GIFT/)


bioregion

Workflow to provide a bioregionalization analysis (see more at https://biorgeo.github.io/bioregion/)

title: Pierre Denelle
text:
I am Postdoctoral researcher at the University of Göttingen, in the Biodiversity, Macroecology and Biogeography team.
My research addresses fundamental questions at the interface of community ecology, macroecology, and functional ecology. I aim to understand and predict the effects of the environment on patterns of biodiversity. I address these questions by combining large databases of species distributions, functional traits, phylogenetic characters, and environmental information with statistical modeling to unravel patterns of diversity across scales. Most of this work focuses on vascular plants.
Key words
Biogeography, community ecology, functional ecology, macroecology, plant diversity

title: About
text: This site has been created entirely with open-source software, using Quarto, R and is hosted on Github Pages.
